description: A named abstraction of software service consisting of local port that the proxy listens on, and the selector that determines which pods will answer requests sent through the proxy.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

spec.description: Spec defines the behavior of a service.

status.description: Most recently observed status of the service.
